name: Slimed Together
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021! Three Slimes have lost one another and you need to help them reunite back into the Slime King. Every Slime has a unique ability that will help you solve the puzzles standing in your way. But that's not all, the slimes have the power to fuse together and unlock new powers based on their fusion!

Your goal is to join all three slimes into one.

Controls: Gamepad Left JoyStickMove/AimLeft or Right BumperChange Character

W S A D

Change CharacterSpacebar | Left ClickAbilityFJoin/Split Characters:

Fire Slime (Red):
Can go through fire.

Jump Slime (Blue):
Can jump one block high.

Air Slime (Yellow):
Can blow wind blast.

Fire/Air Slime (Orange):
Can shoot fire projectiles.

Jump/Fire Slime (Violett):
Can launch itself across chasms.

Air/Jump Slime (Green):
Can phase through fences.

All Mighty Slime (Silver):
You Won!

Side Notes:

The Game contains some bugs and exploits. You are not allowed to join through objects.
